title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.6 - Medicaid/Insurance claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.6 - Medicaid/Insurance claims

State Regulations
(a) Third Party

Reimbursement. (1)

No Medicaid claim may be
submitted by an OASAS program for gambling-only services (addiction services)
unless such program has been approved to provide such services and the service
has been approved by CMS. (2)

Private insurance may be billed for gambling disorder services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
857.6

Adopted

New

York State Register March 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
